page.name: Iris Fan
page.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. This kind of metal fan was used to cool the great leaders of the desert until the huge metal fan blade was dropped on a queen, then the design of metal fans were banned.

properties.name: Iris Fan
properties.description: This item requires a Dragon Amulet. This kind of metal fan was used to cool the great leaders of the desert until the huge metal fan blade was dropped on a queen, then the design of metal fans were banned.

page.name: The Blue Lotus
page.description: Search through the Wastelands to find the rare Blue Lotus, the symbol of the resistance! Look for stacks of stones to find the path.

properties.name: The Blue Lotus
properties.description: Search through the Wastelands to find the rare Blue Lotus, the symbol of the resistance! Look for stacks of stones to find the path.
properties.complete: You've found a rare Blue Desert Lotus! You need to take this rare flower to the Oasis Inn in town. If Kasuf's information was right, a member of the resistance will then approach you and help you find the Orb of Light hidden somewhere in the Sandsea.
